title: Fur Fighters PC
description:
FUR FIGHTERS for PC

Take control of lovable, armed and dangerous stuffed animals in the wacky shoot 'em up action of FUR FIGHTERS for the PC. Play as Tweak the Dragon, Roofus the Dog, Juliette the Cat, and three others as you engage in frantic battles to find your missing babies and defeat the devious General Viggo...

screens and info:  
http://pc.ign.com/articles/163/163198p1.html  
http://www.rottentomatoes.com/g/pc_games/fur_fighters/overview.php

The game has both a single play in adventurous platform upsetting but also lanspel for death matches. To run lanspel over the network works Hamachi excellent (http://www.hamachi.cc/download/)

Many will remember that the Fur Fighters also existed for DC and it ruled that the split screened shooter for two people. Unfortunately the game is not to buy the original anymore either PC or DC, so download it here and buy it if you should happen to find it.

I've pulled the files from my original disc and then XP fixed the game with the files available for download on acclaims page. On Game Copy World is a No cd crack which I unfortunately never had to work, but test it please!


Description by Dj_goebells. Was able to preserve this from the original uploader way back. Works well with Windows 7
